data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Metzler, Eric H., Knudson, Edward C. (2011): A new species of Elasmia Moeschler from New Mexico and Texas, and a new subspecies of Elasmia mandela (Druce) from Texas and Oklahoma (Lepidoptera, Notodontidae, Nystaleinae). ZooKeys 149: 51-67, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.149.1519, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.149.1519
